revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept. See Sosin's comments. Finalizer, beware: there should be an empty text under P. Ammon 1 11, linking to this one, which should be saved as P.Ammon 2 39. A1 -> "[ca.70].1". A3 -> ".5[.1].5". A6 -> "χ̣ρόνον *middot*". A12 -> "δ̣ε̣ῦρο̣ .2". Α19, add space before τ̣ὰς. Β2, add question mark to the |alt:|. C4bis -> ">)<:.5|alt:|αὐτὸς:>(<". C4, C7, add "—" (how do you mark it up?)? C8bis -> ">)ἡμ̣[ῶν](<". D1 -> ".1θ̣.2". D2bis, at the end -> "vac.? ἐκείνου(<" (or use \/ to add ἐκείνου at the right place in l. D3). D3bis should start with ">)"

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. linA3--> [.?].5[.2].5; linA4--> [ca.20][ἀλλὰ (and NOTE: add spaces between brackets where warranted, throughout); linA6--> χ̣ρόνον (no orth, no ancient punctuation); linA9 vestig τ̣ὰ̣ --> vestig τ̣ὰ̣ (need extra space after vestig; NOTE check for this throughout); linA11--> .8; linA13--> ἐ̣π̣αν̣[ελθό]ν̣τ̣ο̣ς(?); linA13 insert space between two apps; linA23--> τῆς οἰκουμένης; linB2--> χ̣[ώρας] <:[.6]; linC12 del overstroke; linD2--> [ca.15].5[.?]<:.5|alt:|(.3ομ(εν )):> (NOTE letter count in text and notes is inconsistent); linD2bis--> <:.5μια̣ τ̣οῦ ἰδι̣[.2]|alt:|ἐ̣ν̣ ἐ̣ρ̣η̣μίᾳ̣ τοῦ ἰδί̣[ου](?):> ; linD5--> [.3].3[.1]; linD5--> <:[.1]ο̣υλει̣αι|alt:|<:[δ]ο̣υλεί̣αι|alt:|[.1]ο̣υλερ̣αι:>:> <:.1-2|alt:|<:η̣|alt:|τ̣ι:>:> ; linE2 <:ἵν|orth|ιν᾿:>᾿ --> <:ἵν’|orth|ἵν*apostrophe*:> ; linE3 <:ἄλλ|orth|αλλ':>᾿ --> <:ἄλλ’|orth|ἄλλ*apostrophe*:>
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;1;11' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;2;39'

Entered text of P.Ammon II 39 from digital copy proofread against print edition. Please note: final iota with supraline at line 12 (fragment C). At l.6 (fragment A) and l.2 (fragment E) stigme and apostrophe noted by the scribe (not present in Leiden plus).
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
